#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        ll n,c;
        scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&c);
        if(n==1){
            printf("Yes\n");
            continue;
        }
        bool f=0;
        if((2*c)%n==0){
            c=(2*c)/n;
            for(ll i=n-1;i<c && !f;i+=(n-1)){
                ll rem=c-i;
                if(rem>=2 && rem%2==0){
                    f=1;
                    break;
                }
            }
        }
        if(f) printf("Yes\n");
        else printf("No\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
